args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set

variable (F : Type _) [Field F]

/-- The unipotent upper-triangular 2Ã—2 matrix E(t). -/
def E (t : F) : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) F := fun i j =>
  if i = 0 âˆ§ j = 0 then 1
  else if i = 0 âˆ§ j = 1 then t
  else if i = 1 âˆ§ j = 0 then 0
  else 1

/-- The set G = { E t | t âˆˆ F }. -/
def G : Set (Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) F) := range (E F)

/-- G is a matrix group under multiplication: it contains the identity, is closed under
    multiplication, and every element has an inverse in G. -/
theorem G_is_matrix_group :
  (1 : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) F) âˆˆ G F âˆ§
  (âˆ€ A B, A âˆˆ G F â†’ B âˆˆ G F â†’ A * B âˆˆ G F) âˆ§
  (âˆ€ A, A âˆˆ G F â†’ âˆƒ B âˆˆ G F, A * B = 1 âˆ§ B * A = 1) := by
  sorry
